participant_1.name: Lisa
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and sociable, Lisa enjoys family time and appreciates small moments of relaxation.
participant_1.background: i drive a mini van. i have five sons. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. coffee is my preferred beverage.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is imaginative and a bit introverted, often preferring the company of books over people.
participant_2.background: i don't have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.
